comment.author: 22708825@N02
comment._content: It's been an exhausting day, stresses and contemporary 'inconveniences, now I can sit back ,look into the 'cinemascope' at New South Whales, and dream through these photograghs. I will escape in time...I will enter into the photogragh, alive,  dreaming, and when I  come back,I will be.. refreshed !

comment._content: So glad you like our photos, John, and that they make people so happy
